input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video I'm going to prepare our docker compose files for some of my frequently used tools like. File Browser. Cut. It. Search Engine. Heimdal. Uptime Kuma. And List Monk. Things are getting easier. For sure that Docker stuff. These video's are getting shorter and more to the point. At least, if you did follow my previous 3 or 4 videos. Installing those apps should be a no brainer now. A reminder, you can find all latest sources at my GitHub page. Let's go!
